original_text: For the unbelieving husband is made holy because of his wife, and the unbelieving wife is made holy because of her husband. Otherwise your children would be unclean, but as it is, they are holy.
korean_text: 믿지 아니하는 남편이 아내로 말미암아 거룩하게 되고 믿지 아니하는 아내가 남편으로 말미암아 거룩하게 되나니 그렇지 아니하면 너희 자녀도 깨끗하지 못하니라 그러나 이제 거룩하니라

sentences.original_text: For the unbelieving husband is made holy because of his wife
sentences.korean_translation: 믿지 않는 남편은 그 아내 때문에 거룩하게 됩니다

sentences.original_text: and the unbelieving wife is made holy because of her husband.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 믿지 않는 아내는 그 남편 때문에 거룩하게 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: Otherwise your children would be unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇지 않으면 너희 자녀들은 부정할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: but as it is, they are holy.
